vote.title: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with Archer Western Construction, LLC for additional work associated with the East Side Water Treatment Plant Site and Security Improvements Project - Not to exceed $396,360.56, from $2,655,900.00 to $3,052,260.56 - Financing: Water Capital Improvement D Fund
